EmailTemplate.subject: Your CMS Should Epitomize Cabin Connectivity and Comfort
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://www.constantaviation.com/]]>
Constant Aviation proudly joins Honeywell in offering their state-of-the-art cabin management system (CMS), Ovation Select®. This enhanced system is designed to provide passengers with the ultimate experience in connectivity and entertainment.
With Ovation Select, CL604 operators can watch live TV or streamed content with full surround sound on family vacations; review presentations with their colleagues in-flight during their next business trip; and even stream content to their mobile device.
Tailored personal control units offer passengers access to several galley functions including lighting, temperature, shades and audio/video from their arm rest or tablet.
Transform your cabin into your office or home theater today with Ovation Select. Contact Constant Aviation to learn more.
